docs.snippet: A U.S. airstrike in Syria earlier this week killed the deputy leader of al-Qaida, known as Abu al-Khayr al-Masri, the group confirmed on Thursday. The death brings a significant blow to the terror network and points to the central role Syria has t...
docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. airstrike in Syria earlier this week killed the deputy leader of al-Qaida, known as Abu al-Khayr al-Masri, the group confirmed on Thursday. The death brings a significant blow to the terror network and points to the central role Syria has taken in its operations.

headline.main: Al-Qaida Confirms Deputy Leader Killed in US Strike in Syria
headline.print_headline: Al-Qaida Confirms Deputy Leader Killed in US Strike in Syria
